meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: SoPAC
agenda_items.description: Authorize acquisition from Royal Oaks Development Co., Inc. of approximately 595,059 square feet (13.66 acres) of unimproved land addressed as 8216 Royal Lane for the SoPAC Trail project.

agenda_items.title: Kleberg Trail
agenda_items.description: Authorize an Amendment No. 1 to the Project Specific Agreement with Dallas County Transportation Major Capital Improvement Project 10230 to increase the overall agreement $1,728,908.00 not to exceed $2,228,908.00, for the purpose of trail design, construction, and funding for the Kleberg Trail.

agenda_items.title: Bahama Beach
agenda_items.description: Authorize a construction services contract for repairs to the existing Coconut Cove water play feature, Green Mat Racer slide, tower for the Orange and Yellow slides, and Big Raft slide.

agenda_items.title: Ordinance Amendment
agenda_items.description: Authorize an ordinance amending Chapter 32 'Parks and Water Reservoirs', of the Dallas City Code.

agenda_items.title: Park Land Dedication
agenda_items.description: Authorize a resolution to support the staff recommended parkland dedication fees and updated ordinance.

agenda_items.title: White Rock Lake Park Master Plan Update

financial_items.description: Increase in overall agreement for Kleberg Trail project
Increase in appropriations for Kleberg Trail project
Contract for repairs at Bahama Beach Waterpark
